items.name: UF-84 Doubt Killer
items.description: Developed by the Ministry of Science while investigating the phenomenon known as The Gloom, this armor is non-permeable and squeak resistant.

passive.name: Unflinching
passive.description: Helps prevent Helldivers from flinching when hit.

items.name: UF-84 Doubt Killer
items.description: Developed by the Ministry of Science while investigating the phenomenon known as The Gloom, this armor is non-permeable and squeak resistant.

items.name: Cover of Darkness
items.description: When children have trouble sleeping, tucking them in under this cape reminds them that they are never alone, for Liberty's unseen defenders are always watching over them.
